verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when he had called <S%G4341><s%> unto him his <S%G846><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, he gave <S%G1325><s%> them <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> against unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%>, to <S%G5620><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out <S%G1544><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to heal <S%G2323><s%> all manner <S%G3956><s%> of sickness <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all manner <S%G3956><s%> of disease <S%G3119><s%>. against: or, over

Now <S%G1161><s%> the names <S%G3686><s%> of the twelve <S%G1427><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> these <S%G5023><s%>; The first <S%G4413><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>; James <S%G2385><s%> the son of <S%G3588><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>;

Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Bartholomew <S%G918><s%>; Thomas <S%G2381><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Matthew <S%G3156><s%> the publican <S%G5057><s%>; James <S%G2385><s%> the son of <S%G3588><s%> Alphaeus <S%G256><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Lebbaeus <S%G3002><s%>, whose surname was <S%G1941><s%> Thaddaeus <S%G2280><s%>;
Simon <S%G4613><s%> the Canaanite <S%G2581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot <S%G2469><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

These <S%G5128><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sent forth <S%G649><s%>, and commanded <S%G3853><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Go <S%G565><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> any city <S%G4172><s%> of the Samaritans <S%G4541><s%> enter ye <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>:
But <S%G1161><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the lost <S%G622><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> of the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> as ye go <S%G4198><s%>, preach <S%G2784><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>.

Heal <S%G2323><s%> the sick <S%G770><s%>, cleanse <S%G2511><s%> the lepers <S%G3015><s%>, raise <S%G1453><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%>: freely <S%G1432><s%> ye have received <S%G2983><s%>, freely <S%G1432><s%> give <S%G1325><s%>.

Nor <S%G3361><s%> scrip <S%G4082><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> your journey <S%G3598><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> coats <S%G5509><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%>, nor <S%G3366><s%> yet staves <S%G4464><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the workman <S%G2040><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> meat <S%G5160><s%>. staves: Gr. a staff

And <S%G1161><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> whatsoever <S%G302><s%> <S%G3739><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> town <S%G2968><s%> ye shall enter <S%G1525><s%>, enquire <S%G1833><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%>; and there <S%G2546><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> till <S%G302><s%> <S%G2193><s%> ye go thence <S%G1831><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> when ye come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an house <S%G3614><s%>, salute <S%G782><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3362><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, nor <S%G3366><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> words <S%G3056><s%>, when ye depart out <S%G1831><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, shake off <S%G1621><s%> the dust <S%G2868><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, It shall be <S%G2071><s%> more tolerable <S%G414><s%> for the land <S%G1093><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrha <S%G1116><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of wolves <S%G3074><s%>: be ye <S%G1096><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> wise <S%G5429><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> serpents <S%G3789><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> harmless <S%G185><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> doves <S%G4058><s%>. harmless: or, simple

But <S%G1161><s%> beware <S%G4337><s%> of <S%G575><s%> men <S%G444><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they will deliver <S%G3860><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the councils <S%G4892><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they will scourge <S%G3146><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> ye shall be brought <S%G71><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> governors <S%G2232><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1161><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> for my <S%G1752><s%> sake <S%G1700><s%>, for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against them <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they deliver <S%G3860><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> up <S%G3860><s%>, take <S%G3309><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> thought <S%G3309><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye shall speak <S%G2980><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that same <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> ye shall speak <S%G2980><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> that speak <S%G2980><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>.

The disciple <S%G3101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> his master <S%G1320><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>.

It is enough <S%G713><s%> for the disciple <S%G3101><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he be <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> his <S%G846><s%> master <S%G1320><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> his <S%G846><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>. Beelzebub: Gr. Beelzebul

Fear <S%G5399><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> covered <S%G2572><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G601><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be revealed <S%G601><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> hid <S%G2927><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be known <S%G1097><s%>.

What <S%G3739><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%>, that speak ye <S%G2036><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> ye hear <S%G191><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the ear <S%G3775><s%>, that preach ye <S%G2784><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the housetops <S%G1430><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G575><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> them which <S%G3588><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> are <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> able <S%G1410><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> the soul <S%G5590><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> him which <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> hell <S%G1067><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the very <S%G2532><s%> hairs <S%G2359><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> numbered <S%G705><s%>.
Fear ye <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> are of more value <S%G1308><s%> than many <S%G4183><s%> sparrows <S%G4765><s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3748><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> shall confess <S%G3670><s%> <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> will I confess <S%G3670><s%> also <S%G2504><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3748><s%> shall <S%G302><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, him <S%G846><s%> will I also <S%G2504><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Think <S%G3543><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I am come <S%G2064><s%> to send <S%G906><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>: I came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to send <S%G906><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> a sword <S%G3162><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I am come <S%G2064><s%> to set <S%G1369><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> at variance <S%G1369><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the daughter <S%G2364><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the daughter in law <S%G3565><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> her <S%G846><s%> mother in law <S%G3994><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> a man's <S%G444><s%> foes <S%G2190><s%> shall be they of his own <S%G846><s%> household <S%G3615><s%>.

He that loveth <S%G5368><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> more than <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of me <S%G3450><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he that loveth <S%G5368><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> more than <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of me <S%G3450><s%>.

He that findeth <S%G2147><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he that loseth <S%G622><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> for my <S%G1700><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

He that receiveth <S%G1209><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> receiveth <S%G1209><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he that receiveth <S%G1209><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> receiveth <S%G1209><s%> him that sent <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall give to drink <S%G4222><s%> unto one <S%G1520><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> little ones <S%G3398><s%> a cup <S%G4221><s%> of cold <S%G5593><s%> water only <S%G3440><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of a disciple <S%G3101><s%>, verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, he shall in no wise <S%G3364><s%> lose <S%G622><s%> his <S%G846><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%>.
